short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark interesting events to use later in Catapult

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save timestamps from a livestream while you watch, and send them to Catapult, the world's best AI-powered video creation platform for livestreamers and their communities.
